thoughts.text: Based on the results of the google command, I think I should use the browse_website command to visit the websites returned by the search. By using this command, I can easily navigate to the websites and gather more detailed information on the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland.

By using this command, I can make more informed recommendations to Atlas based on the information available on these websites.

- Use the browse_website command to navigate to the websites returned by the google command
